projects.name: TIC-TAC-TOE
projects.description: This project is a web-based Tic-Tac-Toe game built primarily with TypeScript, using the React.js framework. It allows two players to compete by marking spaces in a 3x3 grid to align three marks in a row to win.

projects.name: Ip Address Tracker
projects.description: A responsive IP address tracker built using React, utilizing the IP Geolocation API for data retrieval. This project was completed as part of a Frontend Mentor challenge.

projects.name: Full stack Library Management System
projects.description: A full-stack library management system built with React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. It allows users to manage books, including adding, updating, and deleting entries.

projects.name: Note app
projects.description: A simple and user-friendly note-taking application built with React and Typescript. Allows users to create, edit, and delete notes.

projects.name: Url shortner
projects.description: This URL shortener, built with React and TypeScript, utilizes the Shortly API to create shortened links. Provides a clean interface for quickly generating and managing shortened links.

projects.name: Country database
projects.description: A country information database application built with React. Provides a searchable interface to explore details about different countries around the world.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: This React app utilizes the weatherapi.com API to display current weather conditions, forecasts, and other relevant weather information for any specified location.
